this method is responsible for populating adjacent territories
territoryHandler() - Method in class com.risk.controller.FortificationController
This method handles loading adjacent connected countries of the country that current player chooses for fortification Only countries owned by the player will be displayed
territoryHandler() - Method in class com.risk.controller.ReinforcementController
This method is responsible for filling the listView with adjacent territories from currently selected territory
